headlineOptions: Engineering Scalable Systems That Don't Break Under Pressure.

hero.selectedHeadline: Engineering Scalable Systems That Don't Break Under Pressure.
hero.subtitle: Senior Full Stack Developer with 5+ years of experience building scalable web platforms using React, Next.js, Node.js, and AWS. I specialize in performance optimization, system architecture, and leading engineering teams.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a results-driven Full Stack Developer with 5+ years of experience designing and building scalable web applications. My expertise spans frontend architecture, backend systems, cloud infrastructure, and DevOps automation. I focus on writing maintainable code, optimizing performance, and building systems that scale reliably in production.
highlights: Architected and deployed containerized applications on AWS ECS with Fargate
Built Next.js platform serving 100K+ monthly users
Designed microservices architectures for scalable applications
Led and mentored a team of 12 developers
Optimized CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 40%

achievements: Developed and optimized a Next.js e-commerce platform serving 100K+ monthly users
Integrated WhatsApp Business API for automated customer support
Deployed containerized applications on AWS ECS with Fargate
Led a team of 12 developers and enforced engineering best practices
Implemented AWS Lambda serverless functions for real-time processing
Built a custom logging system with log rotation for production monitoring
Automated CI/CD using GitHub Actions reducing deployment time by 40%
